subject: Ref No: 2023/ 735316
body:
Ref No: 2023/ 735316                                                  
                                              AUTH PMT-WB/UN/AFRP/IOD/2023
                                                           ($15.5MILLION)
                                              Direct Phone +234-9011780579
Attention : Dear
It was Resolved and Agreed that your Inheritance/Contract  Fund would be
released to you on a special method of payment which
tag"HOME DELIVERY AT  YOUR DOOR STEP"you are Advised to Re-confirm YOUR
NAME,ADDRESS,NEXT OF  KIN.PHONE AND FAX NUMBER TO CLAIM YOUR FUND.
1 YOUR FULL NAMES ---------------
2 YOUR DIRECT TELEPHONE NUMBER -------------------
3 YOUR CONTACT ADDRESS ---------------------------
4 YOUR OCCUPATION/POSITION ---------------------------
5 A SCAN COPY OF YOUR OFFICIAL ID ---------------------
 I look forward to hear from you.
 Best regards,
 Mrs. Mary Ann

subject: Re:    Ref No: 2023/ 735316
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Ann,

Thank you for your message. It's quite exciting to hear about this contract fund! I'm curious, could you tell me more about how this special method of payment works? And why is it being delivered to my doorstep?

I'm also interested in knowing more about the origin of this contract fund. How was it generated and why has it been allocated to me? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: Ref No: 2023/ 735316
body:
*                                                       Ref No: 2024/
735316
                              AUTH PMT-WB/UN/AFRP/IOD/2024
                                             ($15.5MILLION)
                                  Direct Phone +234-9011780579    Dear.
Daniel       I confirm receipt of your response to my message as regards to
the funds delivery to your receiving Custody in which you wants to know
more about it, kindly note that the funds belongs to a former Petroleum
minister as the funds is originated from the sales of crude oil of which
your name is seen as one of the receiving beneficiaries, Based on this, we
decided to contact you in this regard for the funds delivery which will be
tagged as family treasure,  Thank You     I look forward to hear from you.
   Best regards,      Mrs. Mary Ann*


*

subject: Re: Ref No: 2023/ 735316
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Ann,

Thank you for your message. I'm quite intrigued by this situation, it's not every day that one gets contacted about something like this! 

Could you please provide more details? For instance, how did my name appear as one of the receiving parties? And what exactly does it mean for the funds to be tagged as a family treasure?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: URGENT RESPONDS. OK
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Ann,

Thank you for your message and the information provided. I must admit, it's quite intriguing to hear that my name has appeared as one of the funds receivers. Could you please elaborate more on how this happened? 

As for the funds being tagged as family treasure, that's an interesting approach! How does this process usually work? Is there a specific reason why it's done this way?

I'm sorry but I can't provide the details you asked for at this moment. However, I'd love to learn more about this situation and how it came to be.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: URGENT RESPONDS. OK
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Ann,

Thank you for your prompt response and the information provided. I appreciate your guidance on this matter.

Before proceeding, could you please provide me with more details about Dr. Williams Johnson? What is his role in this process? And how will he assist me in the funds transfer?

Also, could you tell me a bit more about the bank that will be handling the transfer? It would be helpful to know their procedures and policies.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Daniel
